Name: OOM Killed
Exec: msg=$(getfromqm deepin-service-manager/oom plugin-oom '%s process consuming too much memory has been terminated to ensure system stability and performance');msg=$(printf "$msg" $1);title=$(getfromqm deepin-service-manager/oom plugin-oom '%s process terminated');title=$(printf "$title" $1);gdbus call --session --dest org.freedesktop.Notifications --object-path /org/freedesktop/Notifications --method org.freedesktop.Notifications.Notify dde-control-center 0 preferences-system "$title" "$msg" '[]'  '{}' 5000
